typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_NAMES as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> dfFDGroup
dfFDGroup sink(input(
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_NAMES as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	stageInsert: true) ~> sink1
